meanings.sent1: The metal was oxidizable, meaning it could react with oxygen.
meanings.sent2: When exposed to air, the oxidizable substance turned rusty.
meanings.sent3: The oxidizable apple turned brown after being left out for too long.
meanings.sent4: Her temper was like an oxidizable material, easily flaring up.
meanings.sent5: The oxidizable nature of the fuel made it dangerous to store near heat sources.

meanings.sent1: The oxidizable chemicals needed to be stored in airtight containers.
meanings.sent2: The oxidizable paint on the car started peeling due to exposure to the elements.
meanings.sent3: The oxidizable banana peel turned black in no time.
meanings.sent4: His oxidizable mood changed rapidly with the weather.
meanings.sent5: The oxidizable nature of the fabric made it prone to fading in the sun.
